frontmatter.metaTitle: Kafka Broker Discovery, bootstrap server and the role of Zookeeper. Kafka can't work without Zookeeper
frontmatter.metaDescription: Kafka Brokers Discovery, Every Kafka broker is called a bootstrap server.  That means that you only need to connect to one broker and you will be connected to the entire cluster.  Zookeeper manages brokers. Kafka can't work without Zookeeper
